channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Custom Author URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Custom Author URL

item.title: CVE-2023-1614|2024-08-02T05:57:24.940Z -- unknown -- wp%20custom%20author%20url
item.description: The WP Custom Author URL WordPress plugin before 1.0.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
